answers.answer: HiIn the presence of head pain, buttock pain etc rule out high blood pressure, anemia, chronic fatigue syndrome and fibromyalgia. Diabetes and peripheral neuropathies too should be looked at. Also get your Vit D and serum calcium levels checked.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: i have been having head aches for the last 4 day's i dont take any pain killers because i want it to pass it does about 6 hours later and when i put my head down to touch the floor it really hurts the top of my head why
title: why the last 4 months keep getting weird illnesses
